name: Bobblehead College Football
description: Bobblehead College Football is the #1 college football game on iOS.  Build a college campus, recruit a promising team of young bobbleheads and take them into battle against other players in head-to-head or AI-controlled matches. Carefully manage your campus resources and hone your football strategy to reach the top of the leaderboard. Can you become the next Bobblehead Champion?!
